item.title: Garment / Textile Supply Chain Management
item.description: Supply Chain Management Overview What is it? Supply chain strategies Purchasing -> Read Outsourcing Partnering Managing the supply chain Postponement Channel assembly READ others Efficient vs. responsive supply chain Vendor selection -> Read Coordinates and manages all activities of the supply chain Components of the supply chain: External distribution Internal functions External suppliers Watch full powepoint slideshow:
